Producer: Erin Bethea, Jay Michaelson, Drew Waters, Jon Wroblewski
Screenwriter: Erin Bethea, Drew Waters, Candice Irion, Josh Spake
Production Co: Circle 4 Entertainment, Argentum Entertainment, K.A.P Productions, Drew Waters Films
Synopsis: Benjamin Morton's (Jonathan Patrick Moore) life changed forever the day he met the little girl next door. Ava (Erin Bethea) was and always would be the girl of his dreams. From the innocence of a childhood friendship, through adolescent attraction, their love strengthens and grows. When life takes a turn neither of them expected, their entire future is called into question.
Title: New Life
